newsitem.title: USA: Wall St stocks seen opening lower.
newsitem.headline: Wall St stocks seen opening lower.

text.p: More profit-taking is expected to take Wall Street stocks lower at the opening on Tuesday as the market digests the rally of the last three months.

Analysts said that investors would be keeping an eye on Microsoft Corp which reported earnings per share of $0.95 a share after Monday close. The net was $0.05 per share above the First Call estimate.
"I think we are in for another profit-taking day," said Larry Wachtel, analyst at Prudential Securities.
